articles.title: Ramayan effect: Arun Govil blesses woman as she lays at his feet, prays to him - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A viral video shows a woman praying to Ramayan actor Arun Govil by kneeling down in front of him at the airport. The woman looked emotional as she lay at his feet while the actor's wife and others looked on.
